title: Meditation: Relaxed Attentiveness (2017-11-08)
itunes:title: Meditation: Relaxed Attentiveness
description: Meditation: Relaxed Attentiveness (2017-11-08) - The primary qualities of a healing and freeing presence are being alert, open and tender. This meditation arouses these qualities by engaging a mindful awareness of the breath, and then a relaxed, gentle attentiveness to the changing experience of the moment. It ends by bringing lovingkindness to ourselves and all beings.

It ends by bringing lovingkindness to ourselves and all beings.
